name: Sentinel Woods
description: Earn one reputation star for each forest space adjacent to the edge of the map.

name: Greenbough
description: Earn one reputation star for each row and columns with at least one forest space. The same forest space may be scored in a row and a column.

name: Treetower
description: Earn one reputation star for each forest space surrounded on all four sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.

name: Stoneside Forest
description: Earn three reputation star for each mountain space connected to anoter mountain space by a cluster of forest spaces.

name: Canal Lake
description: Earn one reputation star for each water space adjacent to at least one farm space. Earn one reputation star for each farm space adjacent to at least one water space.

name: Mages Valley
description: Earn two reputation stars for each water space adjacent to a mountain soace. Earn on reputation star for each farm space adjacent to a mountain space.

name: The Golden Granary
description: Earn one reputation star for each water space adjacent to a ruins space. Earn three reputation stars for each farm space on a ruins space.

name: Shoreside Expanse
description: Earn three reputation stars for each cluster of farm spaces not adjacent to a water sapce or the edge of the map. Earn three reputation stars for each cluster of water spaces not adjacent to a farm space or the edge of the map.

name: Wildholds
description: Earn eight reputation stars for each cluster of six or more village spaces.

name: Great City
description: Earn one reputation star for each village space in the largest cluster of village spaces that is not adjacent to a mountain space.

name: Greengold Plains
description: Earn three reputation stars for each cluster of village spaces that is adjacent to three or more different terrain types.

name: Shieldgate
description: Earn two reputation star for each village space in the second largest cluster of village spaces.

name: Borderlands
description: Earn six reputation stars for each complete row or complete column of filled spaces.

name: Lost Barony
description: Earn three reputation stars for each space along one edge of the largest square of filled spaces.

name: Thr Broken Road
description: Earn three reputation stars for each complete diagonal line of filled spaces that touches the left and bottom edges of the map.

name: The Cauldrons
description: Earn one reputation star for each empty space surrounded on all four sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.
